attributes.name: THE HALLOWEEN PROJECT 🚨 95% SOLD OUT 🚨  + 2 EXTRA ROOMS ADDED!
attributes.description:
🎃 THE HALLOWEEN PROJECT 🎃


🚨 THE SCARIEST. THE WILDEST. THE MOST INSANE HALLOWEEN RAVE. 🚨

👻 ONE NIGHT ONLY at the legendary home of THE WAREHOUSE PROJECT… if you dare. 👻

This isn’t just a Halloween party—it’s a full-blown NIGHTMARE at DEPOT MAYFIELD. For the first time ever, thousands of will descend into the rave of horror.

Halloween is probably the biggest date of the year in the student calendar, and it doesn't get much better than this for a student halloween event.

Don't miss out on tickets, once they are gone, they're gone.

💀 WHAT TO EXPECT? 💀

🔪 Terrifyingly Good DJs – Spine-chilling drops, haunting beats & the hottest music in the game!

🩸 Insane Horror Production – Blood-red lighting, mind-melting visuals, and eerie effects that will take you to the underworld!

🎭 The Freak Show – Expect the unexpected… sinister performers, twisted characters, and haunting surprises lurking in the shadows!

🕷 Thousands of – Your uni squad just got bigger… but make sure you keep them close, you'll need your dance partners by your side for this one.

HUGE PRIZES FOR THE BEST DRESSED ON THE NIGHT!!!

attributes.name: HowayManay - Newcastle's New Year's Eve
attributes.description:
This New Year’s Eve, Newcastle’s Quayside is the place to be as it transforms into the city’s biggest celebration…

From 8.30pm, the Quayside will transform into a ticket-only party village, bursting with energy, entertainment and atmosphere. Expect incredible live music across two stages, roaming performers lighting up the streets, a vibrant mix of food stalls and lively bars serving up festive cheer (with plenty to purchase).

And when the clock strikes midnight, all eyes will turn to the Tyne for a spectacular firework finale, lighting up the city in unforgettable style to welcome in 2026.

This is a ticketed event and we expect to reach capacity, don’t miss your chance to be part of this year’s magical NYE celebrations and book your ticket now.

Capacity is limited, so advance tickets are essential

Please note there are 3 separate entrance points so please take note of your entry point when buying your tickets
attributes.age-restrictions: Under 16's must be accompanied by an adult

attributes.name: Belfast Cocktail Week 2025
attributes.description:
Cocktails from £5 & discounts at 50+ businesses throughout the city!

*************************************************************************

Get ready for Belfast’s BIGGEST city-wide cocktail event from 7th -16th November 2025! Grab a bargain at your favourite venues or try out somewhere new, with UNLIMITED discounts across the week with your cocktail week wristband!

In our line-up we've handpicked a selection of old favourites, brand-new openings & local gems. Use your wristband in any of our partner venues to unlock £5 signature cocktails and more...

2025 PARTICIPATING VENUES INCLUDE: 

39 Gordon St, Bootleggers, Char & Mash, HALT, Happy's, Haymarket Belfast, Liquor Xxx, Malmaison, Muriels Cafe Bar & Pablos, Ritas, Shed Grill And Seafood, Sweet Afton, The Beehive Complex, The Common Market, The Devenish Complex, The Jeggy Nettle, The Perch, The Points, The Spaniard, The Tipsy Bird, The Watson, The Whitefort, Three Sheets + MANY MORE TO BE ANNOUNCED

PLUS unlock exclusive offers including:
-Fantastic food offers, meaning you can dine out on a discount.
-Shop for a new outfit with discounts at the city’s top fashion retailers.
-On top of £5 cocktails, some venues are offering exclusive VIP drinks offers

Help support the hard-working hospitality businesses in Belfast while enjoying delicious £5 cocktails!

*********************************************************

Pre-order your wristband online 📲

It's important to pre-order your wristband online! This unlocks all of our exclusive offers including our famous £5 signature cocktails 🍸

**********************************************************

Wristband Collection Times

Haymarket (84 Royal Ave, Belfast BT1 1DJ)
MON - SAT: 12PM - 8PM

SUN: 1PM - 8PM
Collection will run from Saturday 1st Nov - 16th Nov

*****

HALT Weaver's Cross (10 Glengall St, Belfast, BT12 5DL)

DAILY FROM 10AM
Collection from the main bar

*****

Malmaison (34-38 Victoria St, Belfast BT1 3GH)

Collection Times - TBC

*****

Note: You will get 1 barcode for every ticket you have purchased. All you have to do is show the staff your ticket barcode which will be scanned and exchanged for a wristband.

**********************************************************


Visit our official website >> cocktailweekbelfast.co.uk

Business registration & sponsorship opportunities are available!

For enquiries please contact: Belfast@cocktail-week.com
attributes.order-complete-message:
Get ready for some cocktails!

Thank you for taking part in Belfast Cocktail Week - we will be sending updates via email and you can also check out our website (which includes an online version of the official guide!)

The wristband pick up point will be announced shortly with opening times!

At our collection point, all you have to do is show the staff your ticket barcode which will be scanned and exchanged for a wristband.

You will get 1 barcode for every ticket you have purchased.

If you have any questions please reach out to us via email at belfast@cocktail-week.com

attributes.name: PORTSMOUTH FRESHERS WELCOME WEEK 2025 ⚡ 9 HUGE EVENTS - Free T-Shirt 👕 & VIP Gold Card with Every Ticket!! 95% SOLD OUT ‼️
attributes.description:
⚡🎓Portsmouth Welcome Week WILL Be the best week of your life! GUARANTEED! 🎓💖


⏰ WRISTBAND. COLLECTION INFORMATION📅
Pick up Date: Sunday 21st September 12-5pm
📍 Location: Tokyjo Joes 29-33 Guildhall Walk, Portsmouth PO1 2RY

📆 Combining not 1, not 2, but 9 of the Biggest Events in the Freshers Calendar! 📆

🎟 Receive FREE entry to 9 different events!

🎟 Receive FREE Astoria VIP Card worth £20! Giving you exclusive drinks and entry discounts all year!! 

✔️ Save you money and guarantee entry to the biggest & best clubs in your new city! 🎟

✔️ Freshers Welcome Week SELL OUT in advance every year! Save £££ purchasing your Welcome Week Freshers bundle now!!

✔️ Limited earlybird tickets are still available for only £15.99! Grab them whilst you can! ✔️

Individual tickets are available for some events! HOWEVER - it is much more cost effective to buy your Welcome Week pack and gain entry and priority entry at every event!

✔️ but be warned some events are exclusively available to the Welcome Week Events and the Freshers Bundle guarantees your entry!

Receive FREE entry to 7 different events during freshers week AND on Halloween AND some EXCLUSIVE freebies 🤩

✅ Buy in confidence with our full refund policy ✅

Please note that a valid form of Student ID will be required for entry

🎓⚡PORTSMOUTH OFFICIAL WELCOME WEEK LINE UP⚡🎓


🏈 WELCOME WEEK EVENT 1: FRESHERS HOUSE PARTY! 🏈

📆DATE:FRIDAY 19TH SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: The Astoria

📦 WELCOME WEEK EVENT 2 : FRESHERS MOVE IN PARTY 📦🗓

📆DATE:SUNDAY 21ST SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: The Astoria

☮️ WELCOME WEEK EVENT 3: FRESHERS WONDERLAND 🌈 ELROW STYLE ABBA FESTIVAL 🗓

📆DATE:MONDAY 22ND SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: Tokyo Joes & The Astoria

⛳🏌🏼‍♂️ WELCOME WEEK EVENT 4 : PORTSCRAWL - The Original Portsmouth Pub Crawl ⛳🏌🏼‍♂️

📆DATE:TUESDAY 23RD SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: Popworld, The Guildhall Village, Wetherspoons, Dockyard, Hampshire Boulevard, Tokyo Joes, The Astoria

🎪WELCOME WEEK EVENT 5: Freshers Fest 🎪 3 Stages 1 huge event

📆DATE:WEDNESDAY 24th SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: The Astoria

🍟🍔 WELCOME WEEK EVENT 6: CHICKEN NUGGET RAVE 🍟🍔

📆DATE:THURSDAY 25TH SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: The Astoria

WELCOME WEEK EVENT 7: Eskimo Project - Portsmouth Biggest Friday!! 

📆DATE:FRIDAY 26TH SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: The Astoria

WELCOME WEEK EVENT 8:  Secret Garden Party 🎉 Outdoor Rave

📆DATE:SATURDAY 27TH SEPTEMBER

📍 VENUE: The Garden @ Astoria

🔞 WELCOME WEEK EVENT 6: THE HALLOWEEN ASYLUM 🗓

📆 DATE: THURSDAY 30TH OCTOBER

📍 VENUE: Tokyo Joes + The Astoria 

🚨MUST ADD ON! QUEUE JUMP UPGRADE!🚨


DON'T FORGET TO PURCHASE YOUR VIP QUEUE JUMP UPGRADE - Skip long Freshers queues by getting straight to the front at every event with the ESSENTIAL Astoria VIP Queue Jump Add on!!


What's Included?... THE ESSENTIAL FRESHERS WELCOME WEEK

#1 FRESHERS HOUSE PARTY! 🏈:  Warm up for Freshers Welcome Week with the infamous House party event! Expect Beer pong 🏓 Party Games 🍻 Free Giveaways 👕

#2 📦 FRESHERS MOVE IN PARTY: Kick off your university journey in the right way with the unmissable Freshers Move in Party! 🎉🎓🍹 Student Drinks Deals
👕 Free Giveaways 🎲 Icebreaker games

#3 🦄FRESHERS WONDERLAND: Elrow Style Freshers Event 🌈🦄Pull-out your funkiest outfit and prepare yourself for feel-good freshers vibes at the Ultimate Freshers Disco ✨🎉 Expect all your favourite classics - the biggest music from an era mixed with an unbelievable venue transformation, Confetti showers, Glitter stations, Loads of free colourful giveaways & more! 🎪

#4 PORTSCRAWL ⛳🏌🏼‍♂️ - The original Portsmouth Bar Crawl: 5000 Students

Get ready for the ultimate bar crawl experience in Portsmouth! Join 5,000 students as we hit 6 of the best venues across the city, each with its own unique route. Explore new spots, meet new friends, and enjoy exclusive drink deals. Plus, grab your FREE Portscrawl T-shirt and show off your event pride! Don’t miss out on this epic night!


#5 CHICKEN NUGGET RAVE 🍟🍔 This Freshers party is renowned for being crazy! 

Get ready to party like never before at the Freshers Chicken Nugget Party! Join 2,000 students for an unforgettable night at Portsmouth’s hottest nightclub. 

Don't miss the tastiest party of the year!

1000's of Chicken nuggets 🍔 Free giveaways 👕Rave batons🚦 100s of inflatables 🎈


#6 🔞 THE ASYLUM 🔞 BIGGEST Halloween Event: Who Will Survive the UK's BIGGEST HALLOWEEN ASYLUM! 🧟🎶

BONUS: The Astoria VIP CARD! Worth £20! Discounts to all your favourite weekly club nights along with amazing drinks deals! ALL YEAR

WRISTBAND VALUE! 

PURCHASE NOW AND SAVE OVER £70!! 

Event prices when purchase individually: 

🏈 Freshers House Party = £8

📦 Official Move in Party = £10

🦄 Wonderland = £15

🏌🏼‍♂️ PortsCrawl = £20 + FREE PUB CRAWL T Shirt

🍟 Chicken Nugget Rave = £10 

🔞 Halloween Aslyum = £15 

🔞 Astoria VIP Card = £20

TOTAL = £98 

✅ REFUND POLICY & Q&A ✅

To provide you with peace of mind, we offer a refund on all tickets if:

  • Tickets are purchased before Thursday 18th of August
  • You are not accepted into your preferred university and decide not to attend any University.
  • If you are accepted into a university we will endeavour to transfer your ticket to one of our other events.
  • Refunds must be requested by Monday the 18th of August and proof must be provided to us via email that you did not get into your chosen university at support@fresherswelcomeweek.com

❓FRESHERS FAQ & IMPORTANT INFO❓

What is the cost of Welcome Week Bundle?

Our Freshers Bundle for each week start at just £9.99! . However, there is a limited number available at this price, so be sure to get them ASAP to save money.

What is the minimum age for attendance?

All our organised events are for individuals aged 18 and over.

Can I bring non-student friends?

Absolutely! Attending university is not a requirement for our events, but please ensure your friends are of a similar age.

How does entry with a freshers wristband work?

Wristband Collection will be held at Tokyo Joes  - Sunday 21st 12-5pm

Entry is simple. Once you've collected your wristband, wear it on your wrist, and just like at any festival, show your wristband for entry to all the events covered by that particular wristband. It's secure and virtually impossible to lose, ensuring a safe entry for you!

Any Other Questions? 📧CONTACT US 24/7 : support@fresherswelcomeweek.com 📧

Portsmouth Freshers f*ck me your house moving in party will not be an ordinary it will be the biggest freshers icebreaker of 2025! We've had the most ultimate freshers events for years crazier than a freshers groovy disco

attributes.name: Gateshead Stadium Firework Frenzy
attributes.description:
The Dunes Event Group is proud to Present a BRAND NEW Firework's event coming to Gateshead Stadium this November

Gateshead Stadium Firework Frenzy will take place on Saturday 1st November 2025 - doors open at 5pm

Pre Sale Tickets are £5 per person (plus booking fee) with no charge for children 3 and under

Tickets may be able to be purchased on the evening from the turnstile - at £10 per person - we anticipate this event will sell out so please book your tickets in advance

Please note that there is no parking on site, but a park and ride facility will be put in place -  more details to follow

Entry to the site will be via the footbridges over the Felling Bypass. 

We do have limited accessibility parking for BLUE BADGE holders only - please contact the event team via email to acquire a parking permit (limited availability and proof of blue badge status required) 

Onsite there will be a GIANT fairground with thrill rides and classic kids rides to suit all ages

On stage will be entertainment from local acts and performers,  hosted by our resident DJ playing all the biggest hits throughout the evening in the build up the to GRAND FINALE at 8:30pm with a HUGE FIREWORK DISPLAY

duneseventgroup.com to book

attributes.name: GET LOOSE [FRIDAY 31-10-25] HALLOWEEN BLOCK PARTY ROSIES BIRMINGHAM [£5 TICKETS] OPEN TILL 4AM
attributes.description:
👻HALLOWEEN BLOCK PARTY RETURNS….THE SPOOKIEST YET

👻FRIDAY 31-10-25

👻BROAD ST TAKEOVER

❌❌ 6 Nightclubs ❌❌ 11 Arenas ❌❌ 5000+ Dead Souls ❌❌ 1 Ticket ❌❌ 1 FRIGHTENING BLOCK PARTY ❌❌

On FRIDAY the 31st October the deserted streets of Birmingham will be taken over by the walking dead as they descend onto Broad Street for a spootacular roadblock event taking over 6 venues!! 31st is the day of the dead, the spirits are out, evil is in the air and for the creatures of the night it's the biggest, scariest, craziest, loudest & most terrifying date of the year. Which is why we are throwing the most gruesome party of the century.

Broad street will be turned into the feeding grounds of horror and fright!! We are bringing a spooktacular event that will be sure to send chills down your spine with the venues left unrecognisable from their usual condition bringing the pits of hell to a Birmingham Halloween Block Party.

Expect:

👻Ghostly Co2 Cannons

👻Bleeding Walls

👻Synchronised Murder Visuals

👻Gruesome Lasers

👻Brain-blowing sound-system

👻Grim Reeper freebees

👻Zombie Dancer

👻Vicious Trick or Treat Giveaways

There is nothing quite like this; so beware & expect the unexpected this Halloween....

We can guarantee two things: first, this will be the biggest fright-fest in town, and secondly… IT WILL SELL OUT. Make sure you’re not the lonely ghoul that’s left out. Get a ticket below asap and prepare for the scare.

❌❌EVIL IN THE AIR❌❌

attributes.name: ULTIMATE MANCHESTER ⚡ presents Halloween Project @ Mayfield Depot
attributes.description:
🎃 THE HALLOWEEN PROJECT  🎃


🚨 THE SCARIEST. THE WILDEST. THE MOST INSANE HALLOWEEN RAVE. 🚨

👻 ONE NIGHT ONLY at the legendary home of THE WAREHOUSE PROJECT… if you dare. 👻

This isn’t just a Halloween party—it’s a full-blown NIGHTMARE at DEPOT MAYFIELD. For the first time ever, thousands of will descend into the rave of horror.

Halloween is probably the biggest date of the year in the student calendar, and it doesn't get much better than this for a student halloween event.

Don't miss out on tickets, once they are gone, they're gone.

💀 WHAT TO EXPECT? 💀

🔪 Terrifyingly Good DJs – Spine-chilling drops, haunting beats & the hottest music in the game!

🩸 Insane Horror Production – Blood-red lighting, mind-melting visuals, and eerie effects that will take you to the underworld!

🎭 The Freak Show – Expect the unexpected… sinister performers, twisted characters, and haunting surprises lurking in the shadows!

🕷 Thousands of – Your uni squad just got bigger… but make sure you keep them close, you'll need your dance partners by your side for this one.

HUGE PRIZES FOR THE BEST DRESSED ON THE NIGHT!!!



🎟 TICKET INFO & REFUND POLICY 🎟

💸 REFUND POLICY: Get a full refund if you’re not accepted into your preferred University or transfer your ticket to another city.
🔞 Must be 18+ to attend
🧥  collect at The Takeover
🕶 FREE Sunglasses - collect at Groovy


Frequently Asked Questions – Your Questions Answered!

Can my friends come?
✅ Yes! They’ll need to purchase their own ticket, each student can bring up to three non-student guests, we love that you can bring friends to enjoy the night.

Where do I use my Ultimate Queue Jump Ticket?
✅ Just show your queue jump ticket at the event entrance, and our team will let you in past the big queues.

Does my ticket have to be in my name?
✅ Nope! We just scan the barcode. Be cautious when buying from third parties to avoid scams.

What ID do I need for entry?
✅ You must bring a valid driving license, provisional license, or passport—this follows national nightclub entry rules.

Manchesters 2025
Get your All access wristband 2025, this will sell out, do not miss out the Ultimate Icebreaker.

attributes.name: LEVEL Presents FREAKY FRIDAY
attributes.description:
L E V E L presents…

attributes.announcement-message:

attributes.name: Brooklyn Zoo Halloween Warehouse Rave 2025
attributes.description:
For 3 years running, our Halloween raves have sold out in advance and this year, with Halloween landing on a Friday, you already know what time it is.

Expect full venue transformation; dark, immersive, and charged with energy. The decor’s going off, and fancy dress is very much part of the motive.

Brooklyn Zoo returns with its wildest Halloween yet, taking over Bristol’s newest 3500-cap venue, The Prospect Building. A stage that’s already hosted Gorgon City, Lil Simz, Annie Mac, DnB Allstars, Sonny Fodera, and Patrick Topping - now it’s our turn to own it.

This isn’t just another night out… it’s a movie.

This Halloween, 3,500 real music fans come together for Bristol’s defining Halloween event, where UK Rap, US Trap, Afrobeats, Amapiano, R&B and Dancehall collide in one massive, unmissable rave.

If you’re coming to stand still, stay in your yard. 


🐅 MAIN ROOM: BROOKLYN ZOO 🦁


From Cardi to Carti, we run the full spectrum.

Sipping on rum, rapping redrum.

Going bar for bar in Kendrick vs Drake battles.

Girls making space to throw it back to J Hus.

At Brooklyn Zoo… they not like us.

 🇬🇧 UK Rap

 🇺🇸 US Trap

 🌍 Afrobeats

 🇿🇦 Amapiano

 🎶 R&B

 🇯🇲 Dancehall & Bashment

💕 ROOM TWO: RNB AFFAIR 💕

Introducing RnB Affair - where cheating on Bristol's (some say diluted) DnB scene has never been so fun.

Fresh from a 22-date sold out residency in Ibiza at world-famous Ibiza Rocks Hotel; we're proud to be bringing RnB Affair to Prospect Building for their UK Debut.
attributes.announcement-message:
Brooklyn Zoo returns with its wildest Halloween yet, taking over Bristol’s newest 3500-cap venue, The Prospect Building.

For 3 years running, our Halloween raves have sold out in advance and this year, with Halloween landing on a Friday, you already know what time it is.

Tickets go on sale: 23rd July @ 10am - 
SET YOU ALARM - THIS WILL SELL OUT

attributes.name: Sunderland Spooktacular 2025 – Double Firework Extravaganza!
attributes.description:
🎃 Sunderland Spooktacular 2025 – Double Firework Extravaganza


The North East’s favourite Halloween event is back – and this year it’s BIGGER than ever!

Join us at Barnes Park, Sunderland, on Friday 31st October 2025 for a full evening of thrills, flames, live entertainment, and TWO spectacular firework displays – all for the price of one ticket! 


Event Highlights: 

✨ Two Firework Displays – One Ticket!


✨ Spellbound – 6:00 PM

Our low-noise firework display designed especially for younger families. Magical colours, music and flames – but without the big bangs.

✨ Afterglow – 8:00 PM

A truly breathtaking firework spectacular with bigger effects, more intensity, and a little more volume (but still family-friendly). Feel the heat as flames light up the night!

🔥 Flame Shows with BOTH Displays – more fire, more heat, more spectacle!

🎭 Best Costume Competition – prizes for adults & kids. Dress up and join the fun!

🎶 Bigger Stage Acts – live music and entertainment all night long.

🤹 Walkabout Characters & Performers – they’re back and there’s more of them!

🍔 Street Food & Funfair Rides – come hungry, stay happy.

Why You Can’t Miss It:
We heard you last year – you wanted MORE! This year we’re delivering: more fireworks, more music, more flames, more fun.

Kicking off November fireworks season in style.

Our displays are delivered by the award-winning Reaction Fireworks Team – the same team behind the Women’s Rugby World Cup display in Sunderland and the incredible weekly shows at Kynren.


TERMS AND CONDITIONS OF ENTRY

All tickets are sold subject to these Terms and Conditions. Purchase and use of a ticket/s to enter the Event are considered acceptance of these Terms and Conditions on your behalf and on behalf of any person for whom you are purchasing tickets.

Ticket Purchase

Tickets are not exchangeable, refundable or transferable. Resale or attempted resale is not allowed. You'll need to bring a ticket to the gate to gain entry.

Your ticket may be invalidated if any part of it is removed, defaced or altered. Tickets are not issued on a sale or return basis; refunds will not be made on returned tickets. Lost or stolen tickets will not be replaced or reissued even if you have proof of purchase. Your ticket is your responsibility.

Ownership or possession of a ticket does not confer any rights (by implication or otherwise) on you to use, alter, copy or otherwise deal with any symbols, trademarks, logos and/or intellectual property appearing on the ticket.

Event Field

This is an outdoor event; no refunds will be given due to inclement weather. Please be aware that although the event area is generally flat, it is a field and if the weather is poor certain areas may be muddy and uneven, please take care when walking and attend in suitable attire. You acknowledge that you enter the event and venue at your own risk.

The Event- General Information

During the event, visitors must remain within the designated boundaries and follow official directions by signage, event staff or security.

The event organisers reserve the right to refuse admission or to eject a ticket holder for behaviour likely to cause damage, injury, nuisance or annoyance or for failure to comply with reasonable requests. Intoxication, aggressive or anti-social behaviour is unacceptable and will result in ejection from the venue. Those ejected from the venue will not be re-admitted to the event and tickets will not be refunded.

By entering the event, you consent to be filmed and photographed during the event. Footage or images may be reproduced, published and exploited by the organiser without restriction including but not limited to marketing and promotional use and in all media.

Opening Times: Gates open at 4.00pm. Fireworks at approximately 6.00pm and 8.00pm.


FAQ’s:

What time does the event start?
Gates open at 4pm and the fireworks will start at approximately 6.00pm and 8.00pm. There is a funfair, live music and other entertainment throughout the evening. The event closes at 9.30pm.

Will there be food available?
Yes, there will be a considerable variety of food outlets selling delicious hot food.

Is there a bar?
This is a family event. There is no bar or alcohol for sale, and any alcohol found will be confiscated.

Is car parking available?
We highly recommend that public transport or normal city centre parking is used as this event will be extremely busy.

There are a limited amount of valid blue badge holder car parking spaces in this car park that are free of charge. Please get in touch with us for further information.

Will there be entertainment?
Yes, there will be funfair rides, live music, and other entertainment. Don’t forget the fancy dress competition with great prizes for children and adults!

Can I pay on the night?
We expect this event to sell out! Please buy your tickets in advance to avoid disappointment.

Can I get a refund for tickets?
There are no refunds under any circumstances. If the event is cancelled, replacement tickets will be issued for a future event.

Are dogs allowed?
Although some dogs don't mind fireworks or strange-looking people in costumes, we won't be allowing any dogs into the event.

Can I bring sparklers or my own fireworks?
No. For everyone’s safety, sparklers, personal fireworks, or any pyrotechnics are strictly prohibited and will be confiscated.

Will there be photography or filming at the event?
Yes. Official event photographers and videographers will be capturing the atmosphere. By entering the event, you give consent to be photographed or filmed, and for that material to be used for future promotional purposes.

attributes.name: ULTIMATE MANCHESTER ‼️⚡ presents Halloween Project @ Mayfield Depot
attributes.description:
THE HALLOWEEN PROJECT - LIMITED TICKETS LEFT⚠️

🎃 THE HALLOWEEN PROJECT by ULTIMATE 🎃


🚨 THE SCARIEST. THE WILDEST. THE MOST INSANE HALLOWEEN RAVE. 🚨

👻 ONE NIGHT ONLY at the legendary home of THE WAREHOUSE PROJECT… if you dare. 👻

This isn’t just a Halloween party—it’s a full-blown NIGHTMARE at DEPOT MAYFIELD. For the first time ever, thousands of will descend into the rave of horror.

Halloween is probably the biggest date of the year in the student calendar, and it doesn't get much better than this for a student halloween event.

Don't miss out on tickets, once they are gone, they're gone.

💀 WHAT TO EXPECT? 💀

🔪 Terrifyingly Good DJs – Spine-chilling drops, haunting beats & the hottest music in the game!

🩸 Insane Horror Production – Blood-red lighting, mind-melting visuals, and eerie effects that will take you to the underworld!

🎭 The Freak Show – Expect the unexpected… sinister performers, twisted characters, and haunting surprises lurking in the shadows!

🕷 Thousands of – Your uni squad just got bigger… but make sure you keep them close, you'll need your dance partners by your side for this one.

HUGE PRIZES FOR THE BEST DRESSED ON THE NIGHT!






OFFICIAL ULTIMATE MANCHESTER 2025

⏰ WRISTBAND. COLLECTION INFORMATION

To make things easy for you, if you live in city centre accommodation you can collect your wristband from the nearest city centre station, and if you’re in Fallowfield accommodation you can pick it up from the nearest Fallowfield station.

📅 Pick up Dates:

Sunday 21st September: 4PM-8PM
Monday 22nd September: 4PM-8PM

Fallowfield Accommodation Pick up from:
📍 Location:256 Wilmslow Rd, Fallowfield, Manchester M14 6LB

City Centre Accommodation Pick up from
📍 Location: Doug’s Hamburgers
Address: No.1, Circle Square, 3 Symphony Park, Manchester M1 7FS

Need help or have trouble getting to the wristband collection call our help line:
📱 07495 971013 or Email: Ella@riffraffevents.com



7 EVENTS - 1 WRISTBAND!

⚡ Get ready for the Ultimate week experience of your life and the only ticket to the best events.⚡

Ultimate is the biggest and wildest events of Manchester Week! Experience Manchester's biggest, best and exclusive venues, unmatched atmosphere and ultimate student vibes.

Whether you're looking to make new friends, party hard, or experience the best nightlife your new city has to offer, these are THE events you don’t want to miss.

We’ve handpicked the BEST events to guarantee you an unforgettable week! With 10 years of consecutive SELL OUTS, this is the ONLY ticket you need. Once it’s gone, it’s gone.

This event sells out early, so buy your fully refundable ticket early to avoid disappointment and save £££.

✨FREE ULTIMATE EVENT PERKS ✨

🎤 VERY SPECIAL GUESTS TBA
😎 FREE GROOVY GLASSES

Previous Guests Include: Hev Bowling, Molly Mae, Jay1, Hardy Caprio, Not3s, LUUDE, Joey Essex, Wes Nelson, Tom Zanetti & Many more.


🚨 THE ULTIMATE MANCHESTER LINE UP 🚨

🏠ULTIMATE EVENT 1: OFFICIAL MOVING IN PARTY
🗓DATE: SUNDAY 21ST SEPTEMBER
📍VENUE: AMBERS

🚨ULTIMATE EVENT 2: THE PROJECT
🗓DATE: MONDAY 22ND SEPTEMBER
📍VENUE: DEPOT MAYFIELD AT THE WAREHOUSE PROJECT

THE FIRST EVER AND ONLY EVENT TO BE HELD AT HOME OF THE WAREHOUSE PROJECT!

✨ULTIMATE EVENT 3: GROOVY - THE ULTIMATE THROWBACK EVENT
🗓DATE: TUESDAY 23RD SEPTEMBER
📍VENUE: ARK + POPWORLD

🔥ULTIMATE EVENT 4: BOOZY BINGO (X2 EVENTS 1 DAY) (BY DAY)
⏰TIME: 8PM - 11PM
🗓DATE: WEDNESDAY 24TH SEPTEMBER
📍VENUE: THE GROSVENOR
✅ MUST ADD ON

 🏖️ ULTIMATE EVENT 5: BEACH PARTY with Special guest IBIZA FINAL BOSS! (BY NIGHT)
🗓DATE: WEDNESDAY 24TH SEPTEMBER
📍VENUE: IMPOSSIBLE

🤫ULTIMATE EVENT 6: SECRET EVENT - LOST @ AMBERS! 
🗓DATE: THURSDAY 25TH SEPTEMBER
📍VENUE: AMBERS 

🪩 ULTIMATE EVENT 7: 00's PARTY
🗓DATE: FRIDAY 26TH SEPTEMBER
📍VENUE: 256 FALLOWFIELD


☠️ULTIMATE EVENT 7: THE HALLOWEEN PROJECT
🗓DATE: FRIDAY 31ST OCTOBER
📍VENUE: DEPOT MAYFIELD AT THE WAREHOUSE PROJECT
✅MUST ADD ON

THE FIRST EVER STUDENT HALLOWEEN EVENT AT THE WAREHOUSE PROJECT 🤡


⚠️ ULTIMATE QUEUE JUMP ADD ON ⚠️
✅ YOU MUST ADD ON YOUR ULTIMATE QUEUE SKIP TO AVOID BIG QUEUES.

🎟 Refund Policy 🎟

All tickets purchased before Thursday the 14th August are fully refundable.
To receive your refund you must submit a refund request before the 18th August.

All refund or City swap requests must be sent to:
📧 info@ultimate.com

WRISTBAND VALUE
BUY YOUR ULTIMATE WRISTBAND NOW AND SAVE OVER £50!!

Event Prices when purchased individually:

Moving In Party @ O2 Ritz + Gorilla = £10
The Project @ The Warehouse Project = £20
Groovy @ Ark = £10
Two Club Takeover = £10
Boozy Bingo = £12
Secret Warehouse Rave @ Secret Venue = £10

Total Value = £98

—----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

🚩 EVENT RED FLAGS 🚩

Choosing the right events can be overwhelming, so here are some key warning signs to watch out for:

🚩 Small or low event following – Reputable event companies have a strong Fatsoma following, as each ticket purchased adds to their followers.

✅ Ultimate has 87,600+ Official Manchester followers and is known across the UK for hosting the biggest and wildest Week parties!

If the Fatsoma following doesn’t look like this DO NOT BUY!

🚩 Unrealistic ticket prices – 99p tickets at questionable venues often indicate poor value for money.

✅ We price our tickets based on the incredible value we provide, including:

🎤 Free Live artist performances worth thousands
🕶 Free Groovy glasses (worth £5)
🎉 Unbeatable events at the best venues

🚩 No proof of past events – If an event has no photos or videos from previous years.

✅ We have 10 years of content showcasing our legendary events!

Stay safe, choose wisely, and get ready for the best Week ever! 🎉


🎟 TICKET INFO & REFUND POLICY 🎟

💸 REFUND POLICY: Get a full refund if you’re not accepted into your preferred University or transfer your ticket to another city.
🔞 Must be 18+ to attend
🕶 FREE Sunglasses - collect at Groovy


Frequently Asked Questions – Your Questions Answered!

Can my home friends come?
✅ Yes! They’ll need to purchase their own ticket, each student can bring up to three non-student guests.

Where do I use my Ultimate Queue Jump Ticket?
✅ Just show your queue jump ticket at the event entrance, and our team will let you in past the big queues

Does my ticket have to be in my name?
✅ Nope! We just scan the barcode. Be cautious when buying from third parties to avoid scams.

What ID do I need for entry?
✅ You must bring a valid driving license, provisional license, University of Manchester Student Id or passport—this follows national nightclub entry rules.


Manchesters 2025
Get your All access wristband 2025 this will sell out, do not miss out the Ultimate Icebreaker.

Cirque Du Soul: Leeds // Halloween
attributes.description:
Introducing our brand partner... Linq

Sending nudes is normal. But it's not safe... that's why Cirque Du Soul is proud to partner with Linq. The safest way to send intimate content. IG: @sendlinqs

★ ★ ★

On Thursday 30th October we take over Beaver Works and warp it into a decaying theatre of nightmares — a place where shadows move on their own and the walls breathe with bad intentions.

This year, headlining is the legendary, Grammy winning, Flowdan! Fresh off massive collaborations with Fred Again, Sammy Virji, and Chase & Status — bringing nothing but back-to-back bangers.

Joining him the unstoppable energy of jungle pioneer General Levy — the voice behind one of the greatest anthems of all time that defined an entire genre. No doubt this will be ‘incredible’.

Next up, UKG sensation Prozak, whether it's a cold & calculated headsy 2-step number or a viral speed garage bootleg, the precociously talented Prozak has been leaving a memorable impression on the scene and we can’t wait to see him in Beaver Works.

All this plus support from 30+ incredible artists, huge immersive Halloween Decor and a whole load of other surprises across the night


★ ★ ★

- THEMED DECORATIONS

- HALLOWEEN PERFORMERS

- CONFETTI & CO2 JETS

- 5 ROOMS OF MUSIC

- HOUSE, DISCO, HIP HOP, DRUM & BASS, GARAGE

- HUGE HEADLINERS

- FUNFAIR RIDES

- FOOD STALLS

- 3000+ RAVERS

Expect Ghostly co2 Cannons, Bleeding LED Walls, Synchronised Murder Visuals, gruesome lasers, the worlds loudest brain-blowing sound-system, Grim Reeper freebees, zombie dancers, Vicious Trick or Treat giveaways & of course horror decor bringing the pits of hell to a London Rave.

attributes.name: Rebel Rebel - HALLOWEEN TAKE TWO! - Nottingham's Greatest Saturday Night - 01/11/25
attributes.description:
✨REBEL REBEL ✨

Rebel Rebel take over the legendary Rock City club and music venue for our parties every Saturday night! You can expect huge sing-along anthems alongside massive stage productions, confetti, co2, dancers, plenty of giveaways and some of the best drink deals you can find in the city on a Saturday night.


🎶 Three mega rooms of music — something for everyone! 🎶


✨ Rock City Main Hall ✨

It's like the world's best festival indoors! Our resident DJs play only the biggest tracks of all time to 2000 people every week, complete with dancers, confetti cannons, co2 blasts, inflatable giveaways and sing-along visuals until the early hours of Sunday morning. It's truly the biggest Saturday night in the city!


🍒 Black Cherry Lounge 🍒

Pop Fiction takes over the Black Cherry lounge, playing the best in naughty pop, one hit wonders, your favorite guilty pleasures and all the R&B Classics - all the great songs you know and love but don't dare to admit are played all night long in this intimate bar and club space!!


🅰️ BETA 🅾️

BETA hosts our signature alternative night Alpha Omega, the weekly home of rock, metal, punk, emo and everything counter-culture. Expect the city's biggest party, with our amazing resident DJs playing the tracks you love, along with regular theme events and giveaways!

Arielle Free, Badger, Ben Hemsley, Ben Snow, Bou, Charlie Tee, Charlie Hedges, Chase & Status, Danny Howard, D.O.D, Eats Everything, Enei, Enzo is Burning, Endor, Franky Wah, Friction, Gorgon City, Girls Don't Sync, Hannah Laing, Interplanetary Criminal, Jax Jones, Kettama, Mozey, KMotionz, Prospa, Mele, Monrroe, Sammy Virji, Shy FX, Sub Focus, Tita Lau, The Shapeshifters, Wilkinson, Window Kid + MORE


Previous guests include: A-Z


Please DO NOT purchase tickets from 3rd party websites and suppliers. Most of these are fake and will not be accepted at the venue. DO NOT respond to people in the comments section of our Facebook or Insta posts - as there is a lot of scammers - we work to ban and block them, but it's not possible to catch them all.
